name: 'An Khe' Trivia Game | 'West Wing' - Season 5 | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Leo was a pilot in Hanoi, how long was he in the jungle after being shot down?
questions.explanation:
Three days.

	The episode showed Leo's thoughts back to that time when he and his RIO were hiding out in the jungles of Hanoi after Leo was shutdown, but Josh told Charlie that Leo was in the jungle for three days before being rescued.

questions.text: The President asked Debbie if she was a fan of what musical group?
questions.explanation:
Crosby Stills, and Nash.

	Charlie reminded the President about his four o'clock meeting with the National Medal of Arts recipients and that's when the President asked Debbie if she was a fan of Crosby Stills and Nash. Debbie told him no and then got into a story about a love affair she had in 1967.

questions.text: When Carol told CJ that Toby and Josh were waiting in her office, why did Carol say they were there?
options: Discuss the Vice President's latest mistake
questions.explanation:
To make fun of her.

	Toby and Josh had seen the "Taylor Reid Show" and thought CJ should accept Taylor Reid's invitation to go on the show after he called her a chicken. Toby thought she should wear a chicken suit.

questions.text: At what place did Abbey tell CJ she was going to start volunteering?
questions.explanation:
Washington Street Clinic.

	While Carol and CJ were discussing Ben, Abbey came in and told CJ that she was going to start volunteering at the Washington Street Clinic. Abbey wanted CJ to know so she wouldn't get blind sided if the press brought it up.

questions.text: At the beginning of the show, what war movie did Abbey want to invite everyone to watch with them?
options: The Bridge On The River Kwai
questions.explanation:
Patton.

	While Abbey and the President were getting ready for bed, everyone started coming into the residence so Abbey suggested they invite more people to come in and they could watch 'Patton' together.

questions.text: Where did Ben say that he and CJ met for the first time?
options: Outside the Department of the Interior
questions.explanation:
Sociology Class.

	CJ was still on the "Taylor Reid Show" when Ben came to the White House to see her so he and Carol talked. Ben showed Carol a picture of them together and asked her if CJ ever talked about the time she got arrested in Cabo.

questions.text: What city was Leo in when he was introducing Ken O'Neal?
questions.explanation:
Chicago.

	Ken O'Neal was Leo's RIO in Vietnam. Leo was introducing him in Chicago for Ken's Humanitarian of the Year award.

questions.text: When discussing the differences between children that have stay-at-home parents and children that go to day care, which famous serial killer did Josh mention might have been affected by day care?
questions.explanation:
Jeffrey Dahmer.

	Josh had Ryan do some research on the Wendt amendment comparing the statistics of children that go to daycare to children that have stay-at-home parents. Ryan thought the amendment had some good points as did Will. After hearing Ryan and will praise the amendment, Josh said he thought more women needed to be in the workforce so they could keep Ryan and Will out of it.

questions.text: Which company did Josh tell CJ was going to offer her free chicken if she appeared in ads for their whole fryers?
questions.explanation:
Tyson.

	After Josh told CJ about Tyson, Toby told her that her favorite restaurant, The Oval Room, added a new item to their menu called the CJ Cregg egg.

questions.text: At the end of the episode, what song was playing while Leo and the President were speaking in Leo's office?
options: A Little More Help From My Friends
questions.explanation:
My Country 'Tis Of Thee.

	The President was given a tape from the recipients of the National Medal of Arts and he was playing one of the songs while he and Leo were talking about Ken O'Neal.
